name: makeable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something, especially an action in a sport, is makeable, it can be achieved or done: I missed another makeable shot on the 5th hole. We need to write a film that would be makable on a small budget. Related word
make
More examplesFewer examplesShe made a mistake on a crucial point, with a makeable backhand volley.She missed a makeable kick at goal with six minutes remaining.He admitted that he probably missed two very makable goals.
